title: If your favorite champion is a criminal
body:
What would he do as a criminal 
Mine:

{{champion:161}} *disintegrates the whole city*

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Ghos,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=N5L1EdEw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-22T21:53:17.473+0000)
>
> {{champion:157}}
> Arrested
> 
> for knocking up too many bitches.

{{champion:45}} 

I suppose nothing really changes...
{{champion:421}} Takes over the New York subway system.

Obligatory over-used bike joke
{{champion:236}}

{{champion:90}} 

Do I really have to say anything about this?
{{champion:268}} Stealing all the sand for Shurima

{{champion:33}} 
Gets cops to shoot him, causing their damage to be reflected off his shell and thornmail and kill them. Once the entire armed forces and police are gone, he uses his tremors to level cities. Upon taking over the ruined world, he declarers is "ok"

{{champion:17}}

How can my little satan become a mere criminal when he is **already public enemy number one**?

Four words.
{{champion:89}} "The dawn has arrived"
Hold the whole world for ransom, else somebody gonna get a hurt real bad.
{{champion:78}}  ults a nurse and wreaks havoc across the entire city
{{champion:6}} : Guts the whole champion pool as a vengeance.
{{champion:16}} Uh... healing people?

> [{quoted}](name=Drackolus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=N5L1EdEw,comment-id=0018,timestamp=2015-03-23T18:37:48.058+0000)
>
> {{champion:16}} Uh... healing people?

illegal medical practice...
"THE LIGHT SHALL BURN YOU"

{{champion:80}} 

Assaulting rival bakers.

{{champion:267}} 

Sneaks into your house and fills your toilet bowl with sea shells. That dastardly fish!
No sexual pun about making people moist?
{{champion:432}}  Arrested for disrupting the cosmic balance of the universe, causing it to collapse, destroying everything and condensing it into a black hole... Oh wait......
{{champion:14}} EVERYTHING!

{{champion:107}} 
Hunts and kills people worthy of a good death.

{{champion:91}} No change...He'd kill people
{{champion:56}} Give the entire world nightmares and kill them.
{{champion:35}} Massive killing spree and illegal fun.
{{champion:157}} Eh, what's new? Already true
{{champion:24}}: The Killing of 5 prostitutes. He was never caught because they could not catch him, too many wards.
{{champion:45}} Someone tell me what difference does this make.

{{champion:62}} beating the hell out of everyone looking for a strong opponent (what... do I have to use a monkey joke, there's more to wu than just him being a monkey you know... sigh)
...and he steals all the bananas...
{{champion:80}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:59}} all have shown off their very long weapons in public
{{champion:106}} Starts a lot of forest fires...

{{champion:102}} as a criminal?

Well I suppose she would follow the old dragon stereo type. She would go about stealing gold and jewels, burning villages to the ground, and eating young virgin sacrifices.
http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_mdrim4rXXw1qgjtflo1_500.gif
{{champion:102}} http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_mdrim4rXXw1qgjtflo1_500.gif (burns city)
{{champion:157}} ok maybe i should *really* kill an elder...

{{champion:99}}  

Razes the landscape.
{{champion:42}} Dropping phosphorous bombs on the citizens and being a terrorist by being a kamikaze pilot. Shooting rockets at peopleee :D
{{champion:99}} C'mon, lasers :)
well {{champion:76}} is an obvious pedophile and {{champion:103}} is a stealer of hearts, souls and livers, i.e. a murderer
{{champion:104}} {{champion:4}} they kind of already are.
{{champion:14}} High speed pursuit down a city avenue.

{{champion:31}} 
EAT. EVERYTHING.
